title: I learned how to skydive!
post_content: It was one of the most thrilling experiences of my life... I still can't believe I went through with it! We truly are outside!!

title: You wouldn't believe how big the Eiffel Tower is...
post_content: I spent the week in France. It was a mind blowing experience! It's true what they say about the culture there, it's truly lively.

title: Is it true that whitewater rafting is dangerous for out of shape people?
post_content: I've always wanted to go white water rafting but I think it'll be a bit ambitious for me to do so with my husband's health. Is there anybody who can help me with that?

title: The Grand Canyon is... pretty grand!
post_content: I've been completely floored by the vibrant colors and breath taking natural beauty of the Grand Canyon! It's insane! I'm not really a nature guy... or I wasn't... until now. I cannot believe how much I love it out here!

title: I learned how to code!
post_content: Might not mean much to you at home, but I'm finally taking the plunge to learn how to code! Before I started, I wasn't even tech savvy enough to operate a 1980s toaster! Now I'm playing God of War: Ragnarok on my Samsung Smart Fridge after converting the source code to JavaScript!!
